title: I GOT PERMA BANNED.........................................
body:
WELL basically i flame  when my team ints, just the same way i get flame when i int, i don't think i deserved perma ban, i literaly just flame bad players, i'm not toxic for no reason, because it really sucks to waste 30\40 mins of my life because some player has no clue what he's doing .
Riot said i'm on the 0.006% of people that are toxic enough to be perma banned , which seems stupid to me because i see this level of flame in every game i play by other players as well , or even worse, i just literally got mad because had bad players inting my games, even tho i know i shouldn't flame its inevitable, everyone flames when they have a 0\9 tristana , like is that worth a PERMA ban???  LIKE...in the 1st game, phanteon even made mom jokes, and said he didn't care about me reporting him , second game i went a bit over the line yeah, but just because my tristana was inting , went to his op.gg and he hadn't played a game in so long that his match history was empty, and obviously i get mad that the bad player is on my team, in the end of second game i was so tilted that i even told her to get cancer, shouldn't have, i know its just a video game, but for that i think 14 days or chat restricted would be enough.
Actually sad, hope riot re****thinks this because they just lost a dedicated diamond player trying to climb..

****Pre-Game

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in media, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowBóss,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=otjhYEJl,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-21T15:02:12.361+0000)
>
> WELL basically i flame  when my team ints, just the same way i get flame when i int.





You think that solves the problem flaming back ? It only make it worse.








>  i dont think i deserved perma ban,
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: r%%%%%ed
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: FUCK YOU ALL
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: SO BAD
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: GET CANBCER
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: fuck you

 ShadowB&oacute;ss: fuck you all
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: legit
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: just fucking
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: get cancer
 ShadowB&oacute;ss: fuck you

Not derserved ? You told them to get cancer how do you mean dint deserve it{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Riot issues permabans when it's clear that a player lacks the will, capacity, or awareness needed to improve their behavior. You don't think your behavior ("ur a fucking trash," "r%%%%%ed," "get cancer," etc.) was permaban-worthy? Riot knows that. _That's why they permabanned you._

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowBóss,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=otjhYEJl,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-21T15:02:12.361+0000)
>

> Riot said i'm on the 0.006% of people that are toxic enough to be perma banned , which seems stupid to me because i see this level of flame in every game i play by other players as well 

Toxic people always encounter a lot of flame, because they either ignite the fire or they put oil into it.
So, thats not really a suprise.
For me, chatlogs such as these are an exception.

Riot is definitly not going to rethink this.
Permabanning players that wish others a slow death is what they want, what we want.

dude that was the most toxic log i read in a while, where the fuck do you find the gall to even complain about it? 

just get the fuck out

> WELL basically i flame when my team ints, just the same way i get flame when i int, i don't think i deserved perma ban, i literaly just flame bad players,

You're not allowed to do that. No matter the situation, you cannot break the rules and expect to get off scot-free. Other people breaking the rules doesn't mean you should do the same.

> everyone flames when they have a 0\9 tristana , like is that worth a PERMA ban??? 

No, they don't. Mind you that permanent suspensions aren't issued right away. You have to work your way up to them, going through other punishment tiers first. To put it simply, a permanent suspension is a conglomeration of all the things you did wrong over an extended period of time. This isn't just about severity anymore, it's about **consistency** as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Bianca Colt,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=otjhYEJl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-21T15:10:08.125+0000)
>
> You're not allowed to do that. No matter the situation, you cannot break the rules and expect to get off scot-free. Other people breaking the rules doesn't mean you should do the same.
> 
> No, they don't. Mind you that permanent suspensions aren't issued right away. You have to work your way up to them, going through other punishment tiers first. To put it simply, a permanent suspension is a conglomeration of all the things you did wrong over an extended period of time. This isn't just about severity anymore, it's about **consistency** as well.

Consistency? You dare speak of consistacy when you are not even consistent. There are so may people who are more toxic than that and what do you you with them? The answer is nothing (for the most part). Literally every game I encounter at least one person so toxic that he woluld make my parents commit suicide just by reading his first sentince, and what happens when 2-4 people report him you might ask? Absolutely nothing. Riot's player behaviour management team is absolutely an inconsistent doggshit, because you know what? It's easier to just throw your hands in the air and give up on reviewing the reports on legit trolls and toxic people and call it a day, than to put thought and focus on thinking about what that particulair person did and if it should be punished.  And then you come to the forums give big words of wisdon 'You were rightfully banned" or 'You musnt break the rules at all cost for you not to recive punishment' (As if we didn't know already) and try to alure us with a false sense of care and responsibillity for the people's experience of the game.  And you dare speak of consistancy. Please tell me how many games have you had with toxic people, and couldn't wait till the post game menu just to report them and hope the would get banned? Too many to count, huh? If you understood than you might have a slight glimpse into how I feel
By the big words of papa Franku (Resting in peice 2013 - 2018) 'Know you place, trash'.

1. This post is old. Be kind, don't necro.

2. Forum mods are not Riot Employees.

3. You have no idea how the system works.

Don't flame. You know you will be punished if you flame. You were told that the other times you were punished for flaming. Just because your teammates are doing poorly is no reason to flame them. If you are being flamed by your teammates, mute them. You have been told this time and time again. Now it's time to learn.

{{sticker:sona-playing}}

Hey there, Summoner!
Your account was suspended because you used abusive language, and made a negative experience for your team.
Your only way of competing on the Fields of Justice is to create a new account.
Remember, suspensions are retracted ONLY if the suspension is an error, which means your account is lost forever.
And also Riot Games do not care who started, they just bring justice.
For me, the ban is deserved. Cancer is a really horrible disease, and you should be ashamed of yourself.
Hope I helped!

>  literaly just flame bad players, i'm not toxic for no reason

Doesn't matter if they are bad or not, being toxic isn't justified.

> like is that worth a PERMA ban???

Yes. You've probably kept up a toxic behavior for a while now, and excessive and on-going negativity will result in a permaban.
You should have been banned long ago for inting, in my opinion.
You deserved to be perma banned from what I read. Make a new account and don't do it again.

Literally  how to you end up tiled in diamond and higher games?

Diamond and higher there's a lot of sell off accounts because they couldn't climb no more or just got bored with garbage plays on their side. 
Literally you can blame that kid or troll that he doesn't belong in that high elo.
Literally if you all had  a discord team of a 5 premade you could all easily win the majority of the games.

Solo Queue or/Duo Queue you\re going to run into a bunch of sell off accounts that's not where these kids belong..


79.5% players that play Ranked are smurfs that can't climb or garbage plays around them. Tilted enough they get 14 day or perm banned or they have the balls to keep on creating smurf accounts.
